description: Essential MCP servers that users can easily add to their ~/.vibekit/mcp-servers.json configuration

filesystem.name: Filesystem Server
filesystem.description: Official MCP server for filesystem operations - read, write, and manage files

task-master-ai.name: Task Master AI
task-master-ai.description: ⚠️ REQUIRED for Taskmaster projects: Task expansion, subtask management, and AI-powered task breakdown. Needs at least ONE API key from any AI provider.

envVarDescriptions.ANTHROPIC_API_KEY: Claude AI API key (recommended, most reliable)
envVarDescriptions.PERPLEXITY_API_KEY: Perplexity search API key (includes research capabilities)
envVarDescriptions.OPENAI_API_KEY: OpenAI API key (for GPT-4, GPT-3.5 models)
envVarDescriptions.GOOGLE_API_KEY: Google AI API key (for Gemini models)
envVarDescriptions.MISTRAL_API_KEY: Mistral AI API key (for Mistral models)
envVarDescriptions.GROQ_API_KEY: Groq API key (fast inference, good for quick tasks)
envVarDescriptions.OPENROUTER_API_KEY: OpenRouter API key (access to multiple models)

installation.instructions: These are the essential MCP servers for VibeKit. Filesystem provides file operations, and Task Master AI enables advanced project management capabilities.
installation.example: Servers can be installed directly from the dashboard using the 'Add' button, or manually added to ~/.vibekit/mcp-servers.json
